thread.title: Arsenal news: I've never seen him like this – Lee Dixon urges Wenger to leave club | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: I've never seen him like this – Lee Dixon urges Wenger to leave club | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: I've never seen him like this – Lee Dixon urges Wenger to leave club | Metro News
text:
Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 8:00 am Arsene Wenger watched his side lose 5-1 to Bayern Munich (Picture: Getty) 
Arsene Wenger will now know it is time to leave Arsenal after the 5-1 humiliation at Bayern Munich, according to Lee Dixon. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The former Arsenal right-back played under Wenger at the start of his reign at the club and says he has never seen the Frenchman act like he did in the Bayern defeat. 
Wenger answered just three questions in his post-match press conference and Dixon says it hurts to see him so low. 
‘It saddens me to see him like that, I know what a winner he is,’ Dixon told ITV Football. Wenger and his staff sit dejected on the bench (Picture: Getty) 
‘That level is not good enough, the team are bereft [of ideas]. 
‘I look at that team and I see a nice team – that’s not what wins you championships. 
‘I think he realises, he seems so low. This team is getting no response from him. 
‘It’s so obvious that they fight for so long and then they lose inspiration. Arsenal fixtures 
Sutton – FA Cup (A) – weekend of 17/18 Feb Liverpool (A) – Sat 4 Mar Bayern Munich – Champions League (H) – Tue 7 Mar Leicester (H) – Sat 11 Mar West Brom (A) – Sat 18 Mar Manchester City (H) – Sat 1 Apr West Ham (H) – Tue 4 Apr Wenger has been at Arsenal for over 20 years (Picture: Getty) 
‘He owes it to himself to change that. 
‘It is he who will pull the rug from under his own turf. 
‘I think he thinks it’s time [to go]. 
‘I’ve never seen him like that before.’ Bayern scored four in the second half (Picture: Getty)
